trends: There have been 32 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around November 23rd 2011
divs: sighting details830 pm on november 23rd, 2011. while walking through a forest with dogs i came upon an area where the path goes down a hill. upon taking this path i began to notice that my vision was acutely disturbed. there began to appear to be distortions in the outside world and focusing on anything was extremely difficult. i initially thought that it was just the darkness of the evening under the canopy of trees and continued walking down the path despite increasing difficulty with my vision and the commencement of a feeling of somatic pressure on my body which made movements increasingly difficult aswell. at one point i decided to turn around because of the distortion in my visual field and walked several steps back up the path in the opposite direction. this seemed to alleviate some of the feeling of pressure and my normal vision began to return. i once again resumed my original course and turned back down the path. this time i proceeded further than when i turned back, and this action increased the intensity of the visual distortions and the somatic pressure. without proper use of my eyes i had to actually feel through the air for a tree to hold on to. it was at this point that i became intensely curious as to what the effects were that had affected my body. i noticed the start of a soft red glow that was illuminating my left hand that rested on the tree trunk, as well some of the trunk, the left side of my body and the ground around the base of the tree, this stood out primarily because my eyes had no trouble at all focusing on the illuminated objects and i clearly saw my hand in a red light. upon looking outwards into the forest and at the sky in an attempt at locating a source of the light, the distortions were immediately present in my visual field. the sensation was one of having a lens placed over the eyes that removed depth perception, contrast and colour and rendered my surrounding objects indistinguable. after witnessing the red glow, i made a final decision to remove myself from the area and i turned around and began groping at the air and slowly walking back up the path. the effects on my body subsequently dropped away and stopped as i made my way farther from the area. i continued to walk up the path back towards my car with the dogs and after approximately 5 minutes i turned around and looked into the sky. there was a very bright, orangish\yellow star like light in the sky, which i took at first to be venus. i was observing the light through the branches of a tree that was in between me and object. after only 15 seconds i noticed that the light in the sky was in fact moving and had passed behind several of the tree branches. at this time i ran into the field to remove the tree from between myself and the light to get as clear a view of it as possible. after another 30 seconds of watching the light, it began to grow and resolved itself into 9 distinct yellowish\white lights in a definite triangular pattern. the object was now moving directly towards me a constant rate of speed. as the object came closer, there became visible several smaller lights positioned at irregular places on the greater unlit structure of the aeriel object. the sound began as a low bass-like rumble that became a pulsating reverberation as the object came closer. the larger structure of the object was greater than the triangle of lights, i could tell this because it was occluding some of the stars behind it as it moved towards me. when it passed it went directly over my head, i estimate at approximately 500 to 1000 feet above me. the only sound at this point was the pulsating reverberation. the object continued along its trajectory and the sound was persistent until they left both my auditory and visual ability to detect them further.
Summary: event included physical distortions to my vision and the appearence of a red light around my body minutes before witnessing the object cross the sky
